title.en: The Main Duties of the Vice President

altTitles.en: The Main and Favourite Duties of Ms. Kurishita

description.en: In the student council room, you'll never find more than two people: the president, Haiya Gin (that's me), and the vice president, Kurishita Namida. We used to have a bunch of other officers too, but since the vice president took care of everything so easily, everyone stopped coming. She's incredibly beautiful, and an honor student with no flaws to speak of, but... For some reason, she's always messing with me, and only me?! A comedy featuring the antics of a strangely doting, tall vice president and an adorably tiny president begins!!!
description.ja: 生徒会室にはいつも2人しかいない――会長の私と副会長の栗下涙。最初は他にもいろんな役職がいたけど、こいつが仕事を全部片づけてしまうのでみんな来なくなった。容姿端麗で文句なしの優等生なのだが…私にだけいつも変なちょっかいをかけてくる――!?お淑やかの皮を被って行われる愛ゆえの暴走――密室の生徒会で起こるヤバめ偏愛コメディ、ここに開幕！

altTitles.vi: Mừng Papa về

description.en: A high school girl is trying to get obsessively close to her kind stepdad. Even going as far as watching him in bed with her mom.
description.ru:
У женщины, на которой я женился, есть дочь. Её зовут Тоуко и она второкурсница старшей школы.
Я заволновался, когда узнал, что у меня появится дочь-подросток, но я рад, что, похоже, понравился ей.

Но был один странный момент, когда расстояние между нами стало слишком близким?..

"Пожалуйста, позаботься обо мне с этого момента, папа ♡"

Я уверен, что никто не знает, кто этот ребёнок на самом деле.
description.pt-br: A mulher com quem me casei tem uma filha, uma estudante do segundo ano chamada Toru Sakurako.  Fiquei preocupada quando soube que a filha dela ainda era uma garota do ensino médio, então fiquei feliz em ver que nos demos bem. Mas às vezes, Toru parecia chegar um pouco perto demais...?

title.en: Hero x Demon King x Villain

altTitles.es-la: Héroes y Reyes, Demonios y Villanos

description.en:
A noble <Hero> who punishes evil while under the protection of gods.
A demon born with tremendous demonic powers, is the last surviving <Demon King>.
And I’m an experienced third-rate <Villiain> that roams around the land.

I want my Villain’s life to be over.
I was going to retire and spend the rest of my life in comfort but the child I picked up by accident turned out to be the demon king and the hero is chasing me to "repay the favor".
My comfortable retirement years are ruined!

The 99 demons that guard the Villain ?
Prepare to die… Yes, may God bless you, now die!
description.ko:
신들의 가호를 받아 악을 처단하는 고결한 ‘영웅’.
악마의 힘을 받아 태어난 강력한 마족 최후의 생존자 ‘마왕’.
악의 조직을 전전하는 숙련된 삼류 ‘악당’.

악당 생활도 이젠 끝이다. 은퇴해서 편안한 여생을 보내려 했더니
우연히 주운 녀석은 마왕이고, 영웅 녀석은 은혜를 갚겠답시고 찾아와
내 편안한 은퇴 생활을 망치고 있다!

악당을 가호하는 아흔아홉 악마시여….
신의 축복이나 받고 뒈지소서!

description.en: Sharks don't have lungs, but they do have to breathe oxygen to survive. Instead of breathing air, though, sharks get oxygen from the water that surrounds them. So they have to move around, if they stop moving for a while, they sink into the water and die, So Sharks have to move and move constantly from birth to death. The same goes for you. If you want to survive, keep moving, then you will be the best hunter… like a shark.

altTitles.en: Hetalia - The Lullaby of the Nightingale (Doujinshi)

altTitles.vi: Cửu lĩnh

description.en:
After just starting at his new school, Mashio Gaku is suspended within a week for getting into a scuffle with a third year. After returning home to his disapproving dad's okonomiyaki joint, his father, Mashio Harumi, can't help but reprimand him and refuses to serve him. Their harsh words are the last exchange they share before an unfortunate traffic accident takes Harumi's life.

At his father's wake, Gaku finds out he was, in his words, a big fuckin' deal. In mourning, Gaku heads out to fish like him and his father always would, only to hook a big catch and get pulled into the water... When he comes to, he finds himself staring a familiar stranger in the face... **in the year 2000.**
description.ja: 真汐樂(ましおがく)は父と2人暮らしの高校1年生。入学早々上級生と乱闘騒ぎを起こし停学処分となった矢先、突然の事故で父を亡くす。父の通夜の晩に、父との思い出である堤防釣りに出かけた樂は、海に落ち22年前にタイムリープしてしまう。そして樂を海から助けたのは、他ならぬ自分と同い年の父・春実だった。春実の両親(樂の祖父母)に気に入られた樂は、宮城樂として真汐家に居候することに。そして、祖父のはからいで父と同じ青波高校に通うことになる。22年前の玖嶺の街は不良だらけ。樂は父と2人でこの街の頂点を目指す!!
description.ru: Душещипательная история о взаимоотношениях отца и сына. Главный герой — Масио Гаку, не особо ладит со своим отцом. После ссоры с сыном, Масио Харуми умирает... Гаку даже подумать не мог, что с его отцом, не особо общительным человеком, придёт проститься так много людей. Вскоре Гаку решает пойти на рыбалку где по случайности падает в море, но сразу же выбирается с помощью какого-то странного человека... Этим незнакомцем оказался его отец, ровно в 2000 году! Теперь Гаку начинает помогать Харуми, своему отцу, добиться статуса лидера города и разобраться что же здесь происходит...
description.vi: Sau cái chết của cha, Mashio Gaku biết được một sự thật động trời: Cha cậu từng là gã du côn mạnh nhất thành phố. Thế rồi một biến cố bất ngờ xảy ra, đưa cậu trở về quá khứ 22 năm trước, khi cha cậu bằng tuổi cậu...

altTitles.vi: Cuộc Hôn Nhân Hoàng Gia
Hôn Nhân Hoàng Gia

description.en:
The symbol of beauty and money, Tatiana Cartien, the most eligible bachelorette of the Freya Empire. The despair of being betrayed by her trusted fiancé lasted only a moment, as who could've known a bigger shock would happen.

"I'll only endure for a few days, getting discovered in an idiotic manners of all ways."

To think that her family, who she believed was on her side, knew her fiancé's nature. Tatiana threatened to never get married, and her mother, who once coddled her, abandoned her.

"If you say you don't want to then I guess you should leave this house."

"..."

"Of course, you should leave behind everything I've given to you."

The time she has left is one week. If she can't find someone worth marrying, she'll be kicked out onto the streets with nothing.

Just when she thought, "Is this the end?" one person came to mind! Kainel Towncent, an illegitimate child who had once been treated with contempt, who then rose from mercenary to the hailed war hero of Freya in 3 years.

A road with a dead end, there's nothing left to lose. In order to survive in this grim world, grabbing the hand of the devil is enough.

"Tatiana Cartien. No matter what anyone says from now on, you're the lady of Towncent. If you come to me with an offer of marriage first, then you need to take responsibility until the end."

---
As the beloved daughter of a viscountess and the fiancée of a duke, Tatiana Cartienne was the belle of high society. But when she refuses to marry after discovering the duke's infidelity, she begins to see that she was simply a pawn in her family's power play. In her attempt to break free, she turns to Kynell Townsend, a war hero who was once humiliated by the viscountess for his attempt to woo Tatiana. With title and fortune out of the picture, will they be able to reset their love story?
description.fr: Fille adorée d'une vicomtesse et fiancée d'un duc, Tatiana Cartien était la fleur de la haute société. Mais lorsqu'elle refuse de se marier après avoir découvert l'infidélité du duc, elle commence à comprendre qu'elle n'était qu'un pion dans l’échiquier du pouvoir de sa famille. Pour tenter de se libérer de cette dernière, elle se tourne vers Kainel Towncent, un héros de guerre qui a été humilié quelques années plutôt par la vicomtesse pour avoir tenté de séduire Tatiana. Sans titre ni fortune, parviendront-ils à relancer leur histoire d'amour ?
description.ru: Татьяне Картье осталась неделя чтобы найти мужа, после того, как он предал её. Последним, о ком она думала, был наёмник Кайнел Таунсенд. Она решает более никому не доверять, и заключить с ним брак по контракту, но... Почему её сердце так быстро бьётся?
description.uk:
Символ краси і грошей, Татьяна Картьє - найшанованіша наречена в імперії Фрея. 
ЇЇ розпач від зради власного нареченого тривав лише одну мить, адже хто б знав, що далі справи підуть тільки гірше.

"Міг почекати декілька днів, а не попастися як ідіот." 

Я вірила, що моя родина на моїй стороні, але вони знали про зраду мого нареченого. Через свої погрози, що вона ніколи не вийде заміж, мати Татьяни, яка так сильно любила її, відвернулася від неї. 
Якщо тобі щось не подобається, то можеш забиратися геть.
“... “
І звісно ж, ти повинна залишити все, що я тобі дала.
У неї залишився всього лиш тиждень. Якщо вона за цей час вона не знайде собі чоловіка, її виженуть на вулицю ні з чим.

І в мить, коли вона подумала:”Це кінець”, на думку спала одна людина!
Кайнель Таунсент, позашлюбна дитина до якої ставилися з презирством, який за три роки прославився, як герой війни Фреї.

Загнана в глухий кут, де немає нічого втрачати. Для виживання в цьому світі, потрібно схопити диявола за руку

“Татьяна Картьє, щоб хто не казав, але віднині ви леді Таунсест.
Якщо ти перша запропонувала мені одружитися, то будь готова взяти на себе відповідальність до самого кінця.”

description.en: Bully × The first love of many, an interpretation of the deepest love. Reborn as a high school sophomore, it was the best year in Meng Ting's short life. She wants to live it to the fullest, she wants to dance again, and never mess with the demonic boy who later raises his butcher knife - Jiang Ren. This summer, around the corner of the school building, Meng Ting heard Jiang Ren, the bad boy, laughing wildly: "What kind of girls do I like? Girls like Meng Ting."

The battle for the scholarship raged like wildfire. At the entrance of the school director’s office, Lin Yujing and Shen Wan came face to face.

After exhausting their tears, the two people stared at each other blankly for three seconds before turning around in unison and leaving.

Shen Wan got onto his private helicopter while Lin Yujing climbed into her Rolls-Royce.

–This is a story of two rich people trying their best to look poor in front of the other.
description.fr: Lorsque les parents de Lin Yu Jing divorcent, elle décide de suivre son père dans une nouvelle ville avec sa belle-mère et son demi-frère. Transférée dans un nouveau lycée, elle se fait très vite de nouveaux amis, dont son voisin de table, le redoublant Shen Juan.

altTitles.vi: Cổ nữ Hotaru

description.en: After losing her mother early on, Hotaru, a girl surrounded by warmth and tranquility, finds her life taking a dramatic turn. An unexpected event draws her into the world of “Goze”, setting her on a path through unknown lands with music as her guide. Armed with her talent and a heart full of questions, she embarks on a quest, seeking her missing father and her true calling…!
description.pt-br: Depois de perder a mãe muito cedo, Hotaru, uma garota cercada de calor e tranquilidade, vê sua vida tomar um rumo dramático. Um evento inesperado a leva ao mundo de “Goze”, colocando-a em um caminho por terras desconhecidas, tendo a música como guia. Dotada por seu talento e com o coração cheio de perguntas, ela embarca em uma jornada em busca de seu pai desaparecido e de sua verdadeira vocação...!

altTitles.es-la: La Espada de la Inquisición Celestial

description.en:
“He is the master of the Nine Heavens.”

Yeon Jeokha was the child of a second wife. Viciously bullied by his father’s first wife and his siblings, he was later imprisoned in a warehouse after his father died of illness…

It has been ten years since his escape after he had learned martial arts that were out of the world.

“I regard the Yeon Family with great bitterness.”

The unstoppable adventure of the sole successor of the Heavenly Inquisition Sword, Yeon Jeokha, begins now!

description.en:
In the year 300X, a cruel dictator has mandated the hunting of all hair in the Chrome Dome Empire. But a single man rises to the occasion and takes a stand against this violation of human hair rights. Bo-bobo, master of the Fist of the Nose Hair, uses the prehensile hairs of his schnoz to most lethal ends. Follow the nonsensical adventures of Bo-bobo and his sentient sidekick snacks as they lead their hilarious rebellion against the Empire.

A parody of the very popular Fist of the North Star (Hokuto no Ken), as well as other Jump manga.

[Official English*](https://www.viz.com/bobobo-bo-bo-bobo)
  ***Only 5 Volumes of the manga were translated. Instead of starting at the beginning, Viz instead released the content that coincided with the later parts of the Anime adaptation.**
        
   **A special single tankoban containing chapters from the Hallelujah Land Arc (Holy Guacamole Land for the dub) was also released, but has since not been reprinted nor is it featured anywhere on the Viz page.**
    
**What were volumes 11-15 of the manga were counted as 1-5 when Viz released them in English. As of October 5, 2010, Viz has not released any additional content, nor have they made any comments regarding Bo-Bo-Bo since then.**

Aang, the strongest human warrior on the verge of death, has inexplicably travelled 60 years into the past, with the double-edged sword of the “strongest demon” power hidden inside him. “The only way to escape the fate of the pastis to evolve. Aang: “Don’t let yourself be a slave to your limits, break free and become a demon that reigns!
description.pt-br: À beira da morte, o guerreiro mais forte da humanidade, Ang, misteriosamente reencarna sessenta anos no futuro com a força do “Demônio mais Forte” — uma espada perigosa de dois gumes. Para resolver suas queixas e revelar a verdade, Ang não tem escolha a não ser “evoluir” continuamente em uma tentativa de fuga de seu destino passado. “Não vou deixar que eu me torne um demônio! Se quero sair, preciso confiar em mim mesmo!”

description.en: Yukari Maki, a diligent high school girl. One day, she spots her classmate, Yusuke Kusaka, who was rumored to be a delinquent, singing a love song. Never having imagined such a sweet, yet sad, singing voice could come from him, Yukari was instantly captivated—without knowing that it would soon be the beginning of a sad, unrequited love.
description.pt-br: Yukari Maki, uma estudante diligente do ensino médio. Um dia, ela vê seu colega de classe, Yusuke Kusaka, que dizem ser um delinquente, cantando uma canção de amor. Nunca tendo imaginado que uma voz tão doce, mas triste, pudesse vir dele, Yukari foi instantaneamente cativada - sem saber que em breve seria o início de um amor triste e não correspondido.

altTitles.es-la: Una princesa que trabaja duro por su favorito

altTitles.en: The Princess is Secretly a Fan

description.en:
I’ve been reincarnated into a novel with my living and breathing bias.
Now I’m an Imperial Princess, who is known by all sorts of epithets, Agnes Saint!

It’s great that she’s filthy rich and a royal and all, but there’s just one problem…
the hateful trash who just insulted by bias’s very existence is none other than ‘me.’

Regardless, I’m here now and…
I will do anything, and everything, within my power to prevent my bias’s death and ensure he experiences nothing but smooth sailing going forward!

I would never wish for Kylo, my kitten, to suffer any sort of shock.
That’s why I have to hide my fervent adoration.
Besides, nothing good would come from revealing my stanning anyways.
So, for the time being, I’ll be perfect at… 

‘stanning in secret.’

altTitles.th: เซอร์แวมพ์

description.en: When a stray black cat crosses Shirota Mahiru’s path, the high school freshman’s life will never be the same again, because "Kuro" is no ordinary feline, but a Servamp, or servant vampire. While Mahiru’s personal philosophy is one of non-intervention, he soon becomes embroiled in an ancient, altogether surreal conflict between vampires and humans.
description.ja: 高校１年生・城田真昼が道ばたで拾った一匹の可愛い黒猫・クロの正体は、「サーヴァンプ」という下僕の吸血鬼。しかも性格は超ひきこもりニート系。契約によってクロの主人となった真昼は、吸血鬼同士の争いに巻き込まれ戦うはめになるのだが……？

description.en: The popular gal who was my childhood friend is secretly uploading provocative selfies!? In his quest to uncover the secret of this popular girl, high school boy Riku discovers that his own deeply hidden emotions were being observed by someone else… A sweet yet suffocatingly intense blend of youth, love, and suspense.
description.ja: 幼なじみの人気ギャルは、過激な自撮りをアップする裏アカ女子！？人気者の秘密を探ろうとする男子高校生・陸は、逆に自分の隠していた心の底を、別の誰かに覗かれていたことを知る‥‥。溺れるほどに甘く、息もできないほど苦しい、青春×愛憎サスペンス。
description.es-la:
¿La chica popular que era mi amiga de la infancia está subiendo en secreto provocativos selfies de cosplay?
En su búsqueda por descubrir el secreto de esta chica popular, el chico de instituto Riku descubre que sus propias emociones, profundamente ocultas, estaban siendo observadas por otra persona...

Una dulce pero asfixiante mezcla de juventud, amor y suspenso.

description.ar: كانت حياة ليزلي تستخدم دائما لتحسين شقيقتها إيلي بعد محاولة فاشلة لاستخراج السحر الأسود داخل ليزلي لنقله إلى إيلي تقرع ليزلي على باب الوحش دوقة وتنادي الدوقة لتبنيها
description.en:
Leslie’s life as the youngest daughter of the Sperado noble family was always used for the betterment of her sister, Eli, who is betrothed to the Crown Prince of the kingdom. After a failed attempt to extract the black magic within Leslie by sacrificing her to transfer it to Eli, Leslie knocks on the door of the monster Duchess Salvatore and, battered, bruised and desperate, pleads for the Duchess to adopt her?!

---

The Speràdo family line possesses a secret: shadow magic. But it's been 100 years since someone last wielded it. When Marquis Speràdo tries to sacrifice Leslie for her favored sister Ellie, little does he know that this awakens the power of darkness in her instead. To escape her family's greed and abuse, Leslie's out to make a deal with the Monstrous Duke: adopt her, and her powers will be at the duke's disposal. Will Leslie escape her parents' cruel grip, or succumb to their evil exploits?

---

**Note:** Chapter 130 is marked by the author as the end of the main story, and Chapters 131 to 150 is listed as an epilogue and flashback-origin story for Duchess Salvatore and her family.

---

- [Alternative Raw (Kakao Webtoon)](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EA%B4%B4%EB%AC%BC-%EA%B3%B5%EC%9E%91%EA%B0%80%EC%9D%98-%EA%B3%84%EC%95%BD-%EA%B3%B5%EB%85%80/2336)
description.es: La vida de Leslie siendo la hija menor de la familia noble Sperado siempre se centró en ser usada para el beneficio de su hermana Eli, la cual es la prometida del Príncipe Heredero del reino. Tras un intento fallido de extraer la magia oscura dentro de Leslie por medio de un sacrificio para transferírsela a Eli, Leslie toca la puerta de la monstruosa Duquesa Salvatore y golpeada, moreteada y desesperada, ¡¿ y le pide a la Duquesa que la adopte?!
description.fr: Fille cadette d’une lignée aux pouvoirs extraordinaires, elle a été élevée dans l’ombre de sa soeur. Et le jour venu, elle découvre qu’elle doit périr pour elle! Pour échapper au sacrifice, une seule possibilité: se venger coûte que coûte de cette famille qui lui a tout pris. Quitte à s’allier avec une guerrière au sang de dragon.
description.it: La giovane Leslie è la figlia più giovane della nobile famiglia Sperado. Lo scopo della sua vita però è sempre stato quello di far vivere meglio la sorella, Ellie, promessa sposa del principe ereditario del regno. La sua famiglia l'ha cresciuta al solo scopo di agevolare la sorella, e un giorno la sacrifica per tentare di estrarre la magia delle ombre presente all'interno di Leslie per donarla alla sorella. Ma Leslie riesce a salvarsi la vita, solo momentaneamente... Riuscirà a cambiare il suo destino, o dovrà sacrificare la sua vita per il bene della sorella?
description.ko:
사랑받을 수 있다면 굶어도, 매를 맞아도 괜찮았다.
그러나 언니를 위한 제물로 불구덩이에 바쳐졌을 때, 그 기대는 산산조각이 났다.

"저를 입양해주세요"

불 속에서 간신히 살아남은 레슬리는 양녀로 삼을 아이를 찾고 있다는 공작을 찾아가

"제국, 아니 대륙 최고의 어둠술사를 얻으실 테니까요."

제국 유일의 공녀이자 어둠술사가 되기로 계약하는데

"레슬리, 이쪽으로 와"
"아니, 어제는 형이랑 먹었으니까 오늘은 둘째 오라버니랑 먹어야지"
"레슬리, 여기 네가 제일 좋아하는 젤리가 있단다."

졸지에 생긴 오빠들이 자기 옆에 앉아 달라며 아침마다 쟁탈전을 벌인다.
저기, 우리 그냥 계약 관계 아니었나요?
description.ru: Лесли всегда жила в угоду своей сестре, Эли. После неудачной попытки извлечь чёрную магию из превращения Лесли в Эли, Лесли стучится в дверь к Княгине чудовищ и умоляет её удочерить?!
description.tr: Leslie'nin hayatı her zaman kardeşi Eli'in iyileşmesi için kullanılmış. Kara büyüyü Leslie'den çıkarıp Elis'e transfer etme girişimi başarısız olduktan sonra, Leslie canavar Düşes'in kapısını çalar ve onu evlatlık edinmesi için yalvarır?!
description.uk: Народжена для того, щоб віддати життя за світле майбутнє сім'ї, Леслі завжди жила на догоду своїй сестрі Елі. Після невдалої спроби жертвопринесення для вилучення магії для Елі, дівчинка стукає в двері до Княгині Чудовиськ, благаючи удочерити її...
description.zh: 斯佩拉多家族的次女莱斯莉，她的人生完全是为了姐姐而活。莱斯莉忍受着来自家人的冷眼和虐待，以为可以换来关爱，直到父母为了让姐姐的力量暴增，而将她献祭。她决定逃离，并投靠整个帝国力量最强的“怪物公爵”，成为她的养女！ “请收养我吧，您将得到整个大陆最强大的黑暗魔法师！”

title.en: Gal Can't Be Kind to Otaku!?

altTitles.ja: オタクに優しいギャルはいない!?

altTitles.ja-ro: Otaku ni Yasashii Gyaru wa Inai!?
Otaku ni Yasashii Gyaru ha Inai!?

altTitles.en: Gal Can't Be Kind to Otaku!?
Gals Can't Be Kind To A Geek!?

altTitles.zh: 没有辣妹会对阿宅温柔!?

altTitles.pt-br: Gal Não Pode ser Gentil com Otaku!?

altTitles.es-la: ¿¡Las Gals no pueden ser amables con los Otakus!?

altTitles.vi: Gyaru không thể tử tế với Otaku ư?

description.en: Takuya Seo is an otaku who likes "anime for girls" and can't say he likes it out loud. One day, he hooks up with two gals from his class, Amane and Ijichi, but it seems that Amane is also an otaku...
description.ja: あまり大きな声で好きと言えない“女児向けアニメ”が好きなオタク 瀬尾卓也。ある日、クラスのギャル 天音さんと伊地知さんに絡まれたのだが、何やら天音さんもオタクの匂いが…？
description.vi: Một anh bạn trung bình Otaku thích anime dành cho bé gái, giáp mặt hai nàng Gyaru xinh đẹp nổi tiếng nhất trường. Nhưng không chỉ có thế, một trong hai nữ nhân xinh đẹp ấy có gì đó...hơi otaku thì phải...?
description.es-la: Takuya Seo es un otaku al que le gusta el "anime para chicas" y no puede decir que le guste en voz alta. Un día, se junta con dos chicas de su clase, Amane e Ijichi, pero parece que Amane también es una otaku...
description.pt-br: Takuya Seo é um otaku que gosta de "animes para garotinhas" e não pode dizer isso em voz alta. Um dia, ele conversa com duas gals da sua sala, Amane e Ijichi, mas parece que a Amane também é uma otaku... Uma comédia romântica escolar onde o otaku conhece as gals que ele gosta!

title.en: Tensei Kizoku, Kantei Skill de Nariagaru ~Jakushou Ryouchi o Uketsuida node, Yuushuu na Jinzai o Fuyashiteitara, Saikyou Ryouchi ni Natteta~

altTitles.ja: 転生貴族、鑑定スキルで成り上がる～弱小領地を受け継いだので、優秀な人材を増やしていたら、最強領地になってた～

altTitles.ja-ro: Tensei Kizoku Kantei Skill de Nariagaru ~Jakushou Ryouchi wo Uketsuidanode, Yuushuuna Jinzai wo Fuyashite Itara, Saikyou Ryouchi ni Natteta~

altTitles.en: As a Reincarnated Aristocrat, I'll Use My Appraisal Skill to Rise in the World: I Inherited a Weak Territory, and If I Increase the Number of Capable Personnel, It Will Become the Strongest Territory

altTitles.zh-hk: 轉生貴族，以鑑定技能成名～因為繼承了弱小的領地，所以如果增加了優秀的人才，就會成為最強的領地～

altTitles.id: Terlahir kembali menjadi seorang bangsawan dengan skill penilaian
Seorang bangsawan yang bereinkarnasi, bangkit dengan kemampuan analisis

altTitles.pt-br: Como um Aristocrata Reencarnado, Usarei Minha Habilidade de Avaliação para Subir no Mundo

altTitles.vi: Quý Tộc Tái Sinh Thăng Tiến Nhờ Kỹ Năng Thẩm Định: Vì Thừa Kế Một Lãnh Địa Nhỏ Yếu, Nên Khi Tuyển Dụng Người Tài, Đã Trở Thành Lãnh Địa Mạnh Nhất
Tái Sinh Thành Quý Tộc Với Kĩ Năng "Thẩm Định"

description.en: After being reincarnated, Ars Louvent is supposed to live in a different world as a weak aristocrat. Both his physical strength and intelligence were mediocre in both worlds, but here he naturally possessed a skill called "Appraisal" that allowed him to see the potential of any person. By gathering talented people by his side, Ars uses this "Appraisal" skill to transform his weak territory into the strongest one! But the road ahead of him won't be so simple.
description.ja: 転生し、弱小貴族として異世界を生きることになったアルス・ローベント。現代同様、異世界でも体力・知力ともに平凡だったが、“鑑定スキル”という人の潜在能力を知ることが出来るスキルを生まれつき所持していた。アルスは自分の民たちを守るため、“鑑定スキル”で弱小領地を最強の領地へと変貌させていく───！
description.vi: Sau khi được tái sinh, Ars Louvent được cho là một quý tộc yếu kém. Cả sức mạnh thể chất và trí tuệ của cậu đều ở mức trung bình ở cả 2 thế giới. Nhưng cậu sở hữu một kĩ năng độc nhất có tên ' Thẩm định' cho phép cậu có thể nhìn được chỉ số và tiềm năng của mọi người. Bằng cách tập hợp những người tài năng về bên cạnh, Ars sẽ sử dụng kĩ năng 'Thẩm định' này để khiến lãnh thổ yếu ớt của mình thành nơi mạnh nhất! Nhưng con đường phía trước của cậu sẽ không hề dễ dàng.
description.pt-br: Após ser reencarnado, Ars Louvent deve viver em um mundo diferente como um aristocrata fraco. Tanto sua força física quanto sua inteligência eram medíocres em ambos os mundos, mas aqui ele naturalmente possuía uma habilidade chamada “Avaliação” que lhe permitia ver o potencial de qualquer pessoa. Ao reunir pessoas talentosas ao seu lado, Ars usa esta habilidade de “Avaliação” para transformar seu território fraco no mais forte! Mas o caminho à sua frente não será tão simples.

title.en: Fate/Grand Order -Epic of Remnant- Pseudo-Singularity I: Quarantined Territory of Malice, Shinjuku - Shinjuku Phantom Incident

altTitles.ja: フェイト／グランドオーダー　エピック　オブ　レムナント　亜種特異点Ⅰ 悪性隔絶魔境 新宿 新宿幻霊事件

altTitles.ja-ro: Fate/Grand Order -Epic of Remnant- Ashu Tokuiten I: Akushou Kakuzetsu Makyou, Shinjuku - Maboroshi Tamashi Jiken

altTitles.ru: Судьба/Великий приказ: Эпопея Остатка-Псевдосингулярность I: Карантинная территория злого умысла, Синдзюку- Инцидент Фантома Синдзюку

description.en:
The curtain rises on Pseudo-Singularity I.
The stage: Shinjuku. Fight alongside mysterious new Servants in a prison district cut off from the outside world.
description.ru: Новая сингулярность, которая появилась перед Рицуко Фуджимару, который спас мир. Чтобы исправить искажение истории, Фуджимару, который был перемещен в Синдзюку в 1999 год, встречает одного слугу, который называет себя «Арчер Синдзюку». В городе, где широко распространено зло, открывается занавес истории первого фрагмента!

altTitles.ja: ミズダコちゃんからは逃げられない！

altTitles.vi: Không thể thoát khỏi Mizudako-chan!

description.en:
Akigai Kanisuke is an ordinary high school boy. His daily life changes when Mizuda Yuuko (a.k.a. Mizudako-chan), a demi-human girl, transfers to his school.
A cute, mysterious, and slightly scary story begins!

This tongue-in-cheek semi-autobiography follows the absurdly gruesome adventures of a lonely boy and his singularly crazed family. His escape from the madness that surrounds him is his collection of pickled animal and human body parts, to which he adds as one family member after another meet with a grotesque and sometimes terrifyingly funny death... (Source: AniList)

altTitles.th: จอมเวทไร้ขีดจำกัด

description.en:
After Sirone was abandoned in a stable, he was found by a family of hunters and raised in a loving home. 

Despite the hardships of the peasant life, he learned how to read from a young age and became obsessed with books, especially ones on the history of magic. One day, he has an unlikely encounter with a mage and learns how to enter the "spirit zone," the first step to learning how to use magic. 

Although they say only nobles can be mages, will Sirone be able to prove his infinite potential?

In the Kingdom of Wardell Ceram, a realm rich in flowers and trees, the charming duo of Luca and Sylvain live outside the law. As the Wolf Claws, they are a chivalrous thieves who target those nobles who commit evil deeds. Their deeds bring them to the attention of the Kingdom's Princess, who wants to recruit them for a very special task. A romantic comedy about love that transcends class!

Senya is just an ordinary boy, who wanted to become an astronaut as a kid. One day and suddenly, he's transported into another world after seeing on the rooftop of his school something like a "tower" going across the sky. There, he witnesses a ruined world, where skyscrapers are connected by suspension bridges. Senya, perplexed, manages to see a girl standing on the roof of another building, as well as a masked man holding a bloody weapon in his hands…
description.ja:
高層ビル × 吊り橋 × 仮面殺人鬼!!!　少年はこの冷酷な「世界」で生き残れるのか!?

宇宙飛行士に憧れていた普通の少年・千夜は、学校の屋上で天を貫く「塔」のようなものを見た瞬間、突如異世界に飛ばされてしまう。そこは高層ビル群の間が吊り橋でつながれた荒廃した世界。戸惑う千夜の前で美少女がビルから飛び降り、血まみれの刃物を携えた仮面殺人鬼が現れる!!

description.en:
Two geniuses who made a name for themselves in the middle school baseball world but had distanced themselves from baseball have serendipitously come together at an obsecure public high school in Tokyo.

Kiyomine Haruka, a pitcher with a flawless, powerful arm. His battery partner, the shrewd catcher known as the 'General', Kaname Kei (who's currently a complete amateur due to memory loss!). And then there are those who once fell in defeat to these two...

Their paths have crossed once more, and now their high school baseball story begins anew, springing into action!
description.ja:
中学球界で名を馳せるも野球から遠ざかっていた天才たちが都立の野球無名高校で偶然集結。

完全無欠の剛腕投手・清峰葉流火（きよみねはるか）。その相方（バッテリー）、切れ者捕手の“智将”要圭（記憶喪失により現在、素人！）。そして、かつて2人に敗れ散った者たち…

巡り合い、再び動き出す彼らの高校野球ストーリーがいま始まる!

altTitles.ja: がばい -佐賀のがばいばあちゃん-
がばい佐賀のがばいばあちゃん

altTitles.en: The Story of my Wonderful [Gabai] Grandmother

description.en: This is the story of a young boy, after being sent from Hiroshima to Saga (10 years after the second World War, in 1958) by his mom because of a lack of money, journeying to a faraway place, and living in conditions alien to him, definitely makes him miss home. Worse, he is not familiar with his grandmother and her ways too. But with his Gabai Granny, he will slowly discover with his growing pains, just how resourceful Granny is…

altTitles.ja: 猫又さんと不器用な恋

description.en:
At dawn, when the snow is falling, Nikkari finds a person who is freezing on the bridge.
He has two tails and cat ears and claims to be a "Nekomata".
Unable to leave the enigmatic Nekomata alone, they end up looking for things together, but the true face he shows sometimes makes Nikkari nervous...?

altTitles.ja: 真夜中ハートチューン

altTitles.en: Tune In to the Midnight Heart

altTitles.pt-br: Sintonizando com o Coração da Meia Noite
Em busca da garota por trás da voz

description.en:
"Late at night, alone on my bed, your voice was the only thing that saved me. I want to talk to you again. There's something I want to say."

Without knowing her real name or face, Yamabuki Arisu, a second-year high school student, was looking for a girl named "Apollo'' who was a livestreamer. However, one day, Arisu gets a clue about Apollo from the broadcast club of the high school where she is going. There were 4 beautiful girls who dreamed of "getting a job related to voice"!! Who is Apollo? What will happen to the dreams of the four people?
___
**Links:**
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10568/episode/347385) (U.S. Only)
description.ja:
「深夜ひとり、ベッドの上、キミの声だけが救いだった。もう一度キミと話したい。言いたいことがあるんだ」。

高校2年生の山吹有栖は、「アポロ」という名の、顔も本名も知らないラジオ配信者の少女を探していた。だがある日、有栖は進学先の高校の放送部にアポロの手がかりを得る。そこにいたのは「声に関わる仕事に就く」夢を描く美少女が…4人!! アポロは誰？4人の夢の行方は？かわいくも懸命なサクセスラブコメ、ここに開演!!
description.ru:
«Пока я лежал на кровати посреди ночи в полном одиночестве, твой голос был моим единственным утешением. Я хочу поговорить с тобой ещё раз. И должен кое-что тебе сказать».

Ямабуки Арису, ученик второго класса старшей школы, ищет бывшую ведущую радио-стримов «Аполло», не зная ни её лица, ни имени. Однако, однажды он понимает, что Аполло скрывается среди участниц клуба радиовещания в его школе. Четыре красавицы оттуда мечтают получить работу, связанную с голосом. Но которая из них — Аполло? И что станет с их мечтами? Милый ромком о тяжёлом труде и успехе начинается!
description.pt-br: Yamabuki Arisu, um estudante do segundo ano do ensino médio, estava procurando por uma garota chamada “Apollo”, que era locutora de rádio e ele não conhecia seu rosto ou seu nome verdadeiro. No entanto, um dia, Arisu recebe uma pista sobre Apollo do clube de transmissão da escola secundária para a qual ela estava indo. Havia quatro belas garotas que sonhavam em “conseguir um emprego relacionado à voz”!! Quem é Apollo? O que acontecerá com os sonhos dessas quatro pessoas? Uma comédia romântica fofa, mas trabalhadora e de sucesso, começa aqui!!

altTitles.vi: Câu truyện kì lạ về thần tình yêu

description.en: The protagonist asks Cupid to win the heart of his beloved. However, Cupid holds her shot, asking, "Isn't this just brainwashing?"
description.ja: 意中のあの子を射止めようと、キューピッドに依頼した主人公。だがキューピッドは「こんなの洗脳じゃない？」と発言し、撃つのを制止され…!?

altTitles.ja: サーシャちゃんとクラスメイトオタクくん

altTitles.es-la: La chica de secundaria Sasha-chan y su compañero de clases Otaku-kun

altTitles.vi: Bé sơ trung Sasha và thằng bạn Otaku cùng lớp

description.en:
I am an aspiring mangaka, currently assisting in the production of erotic doujinshi as a middle school student. While I was reading doujinshi at school, a beautiful girl very interested in erotic things, Sasha-san, suddenly called me “Master”!?

The story of a beautiful, cheerful girl volunteering to be my ecchi disciple.
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/57098)
description.fr:
Fujiwara est un mangaka amateur, il dessine des mangas érotiques alors qu’il n’est que collégien. Tandis qu'il lisait un porno à l'école, une jolie fille nommée Sasha qui s’avère être très intéressée par ces choses, et lui adresse la parole, elle se met même à l’appeler "Maître" !? 

  C’est l'histoire d'une belle et joyeuse fille qui se porte volontaire pour être mon disciple dans la perversion.
description.ja: 僕は未来の大漫画家にして現えっちな同人誌アシの中学生。学校で同人誌を読んでいたら、えっち方面に興味津々の美少女、サーシャさんから「ししょー」と呼ばれ‥‥!?
description.es-la: Sin importarle el qué dirán y sin temor a caer en lo más bajo de la escala social dentro de la escuela, Otaku-kun no oculta su gran afición por los mangas para adultos, cosa que le hace ganarse el rechazo de su salón apenas en el primer día de clases; sin embargo, Sasha, lejos de sentir aberración por su afición, muestra un interés peculiar, iniciando así una relación... ¡¿mentor-alumna?!

altTitles.ja: うちの不敵なギャングスタ

description.en: Born as a daughter of a gangster family, Hanazame Ranko longs for an "ordinary romance". However, the young head of another group, Sumikawa, always bothers her! People are scared away because of Sumikawa, who is said to be the worst in the underworld! However, he always sticks by her and if she falls in love with him, whe can't go back to "normal" anymore. A heroine who never wants to fall in love x a young head who plays with her, a love struggle without justice, breaks out here!

title.en: Touhou - Scarlet Devil After: Kurenai Makan no Oshigoto (Doujinshi)

altTitles.en: Working at the Scarlet Devil Mansion

altTitles.ja: スカーレットデビル・アフター　紅魔館のおしごと

description.en:
From Gaku Gaku Animal Land:

Before she became a door-guard, she was a maid...
A sequel of "Scarlet Devil" by the same author, Akatsuki Dou

title.en: Gap no Aru Kanojo "Majimena ano Ko"

altTitles.ja: ギャップのある彼女「真面目なあの子」

altTitles.en: The Gap Between Her and Her “Serious Side"

title.en: The New Legend of the Strongest Man Kurosawa

description.en: The man of legend has come back to life! Kurosawa, who led the homeless army in a fierce battle against a group of delinquents in *The Legend of A Strongest Man Kurosawa*, was thought to have gone to his eternal rest. After spending eight whole years in a hospital bed, he makes a miraculous comeback in 2013! The fabled man returns to the present life to create a new legend... in spite of the fact that the present life is not quite so great.

altTitles.en: I Am The Top Ranker Newbie

altTitles.th: ผู้เล่นหน้าใหม่เลเวลแมกซ์

altTitles.ja: 俺だけレベルMAXなビギナー

description.de: Jin Hyuk ist Streamer und der einzige, der das Ende des Virtual-Reality-Spiels „Turm der Prüfungen“ erlebt hat. Da das Spiel jedoch immer mehr an Beliebtheit verliert, wird auch seine Streamer-Karriere immer hoffnungsloser. Doch eines Tages wird „Turm der Prüfungen" plötzlich zur Realität und die Welt steht vor dem Abgrund. Jin Hyuk, der sich im Spiel besser auskennt als jeder andere, wird zwangsläufig zur letzten Hoffnung der Menschheit!
description.en:
Kang Jinhyeok, a gaming streamer and content creator, is the only person who has cleared the game, [Tower of Trials]. However, as the game’s popularity declines, it becomes increasingly difficult for him to continue making a living as a content creator. Jinhyeok prepares to end his 11-year-long relationship with the game and say goodbye to his humble group of subscribers. But on that very day, the Tower of Trials appears in reality with a message saying that humanity will perish unless all players clear each floor within 90 days.

Jinhyeok, who knows the game better than anyone, decides to use his knowledge to his advantage and dominate the tower. 

"It’s time to show everyone what a hardcore gamer can do!"
description.fr: Le jeu de réalité virtuelle "La Tour de l'Épreuve" est officiellement démodé et le streamer Jinhyuk est le seul à être resté jusqu'au bout pour terminer le jeu. Quand un jour "La Tour de l'Épreuve" devient réalité, Jinhyuk qui connaît les éléments du jeu mieux que personne aura forcément un grand avantage sur les autres !
description.id: Jinhyuk, satu-satunya pemain game [MENARA UJIAN] yang menyelesaikan sampai akhir meski popularitas game telah menurun. Hingga suatu hari [MENARA UJIAN] menjadi kenyataan, Jinhyuk harus menyelesaikannya dengan segala elemen yang ia ketahui tentang game ini!
description.ja: ゲーム実況ストリーマーとして活動している主人公・鈴木裕人（すずきひろと）。彼は、万人があきらめたクソゲー『試練の塔』を挑戦しクリアした唯一のプレイヤーであった。念願のエンディングを見ることができたものの、もう誰も興味をもたないこのゲームはサービス終了が確実視されていた…。11年もかけクソゲーをクリアした裕人はこれを機に現実と向き合い、ゲーム実況者としての生活を終わらせることを決心した—。が次の日、現実世界に異変が起きる。街中に突如現れた不吉な塔、そして人類に課される生死をかけた試練。それはまさに裕人が11年の月日を費やしクリアした『試練の塔』そのものであった。塔の攻略法を把握している裕人はその経験を活かし、誰よりも強い最強のビギナーとしてあらたな試練に挑む！
description.ko:
게임 너튜버로 활동 중인 주인공 진혁은 유일하게
[시련의 탑]의 엔딩을 봤지만, 게임의 인기가 하락하며
더 이상 게임 너튜버로서의 삶도 유지하기 힘들어진다.

엔딩을 보았기에 이대로 게임을 마무리하려는 진혁.
바로 그날, [시련의 탑]은 현실이 되었다.
게임의 모든 요소를 다 알고 있는 진혁은
누구보다 빠르게 모든 것을 차지한다!

"진짜 고인물이 뭔지 보여주지."
description.ru:
Главный герой Джин Хек – игрок и стример, единственный, кто прошёл до конца «Башню испытаний».
Когда он увидел концовку игры, захотел бросить её. Но в тот же день «Башня испытания» стала реальностью. И главному герою не осталось ничего, кроме как показать, на что способен тот, кто знает все нюансы игры.

«Я покажу вам, что такое настоящий задрот!»
description.th: "จินฮยอก" สตรีมเมอร์หนุ่ม ผู้หลงใหลในการเล่นเกม ใช้เวลากว่า 11 ปี ในการบรรลุชั้นบนสุดของ '[หอคอยแห่งความทรหด] เกมแฟนตาซีเสมือนจริง' พอบรรลุเป้าหมายแล้ว จึงเกิดความคิดที่อยากจะล้มเลิกการเล่นเกม และการทำสตรีมมิ่ง แต่จู่ๆ วันหนึ่งเขาก็ตื่นมาพบว่า [หอคอยแห่งความทรหด] โผล่ขึ้นมาในชีวิตจริงซะอย่างนั้น!?
description.zh:
当游戏变为现实！
无名主播竟是唯一通关者！
男主镇赫是一名游戏主播，也是唯一一位“试炼之塔”游戏的通关玩家。随着“试炼之塔”这款游戏的热度下降，游戏主播的工作渐渐无法维持镇赫的生活。通关后的镇赫本想就此退游，然而游戏竟成为了现实。如果失败世界就会灭亡！对游戏了如指掌的镇赫还能在现实世界中通关吗？
description.pt-br: Jinhyuk, um viciado completo, foi o único a ter visto o final da [Torre dos Testes], mas à medida que a popularidade do jogo diminui, fica difícil manter a vida com o jogo. Jinhyuk quer terminar o jogo assim porque ele viu o final. Naquele mesmo dia, a [Torre dos Testes] se tornou uma realidade. Jinhyuk, que conhece todos os elementos do jogo, controla tudo mais rápido do que qualquer um! “Vou te mostrar o que é um profissional de verdade.”
description.zh-hk: 活躍於遊戲NewTube頻道的主角——振赫，他是唯一看過[試煉之塔]的結局，因為該款遊戲的人氣大跌，要經營NewTube頻道再也難以維持生計。 看完遊戲的結局後，原本振赫預計要結束不再玩遊戲。但就在當天，[試煉之塔]竟成為了現實。了解遊戲所有關卡的振赫，比誰都還要快占據所有物品。 「讓你見識什麼是真正的開掛高手。」

altTitles.vi: Hồ Ly Thời Loạn

description.en: "Stop your evil deeds and take the right path!" That is the creed of Youko Tama and her younger step brother, Jinka Sendou. The two demon siblings travel the country to stop the deeds of all evil doers, along with a scaredy-cat swordsman they picked up along the way, Hyoudou Shinsuke. During their travels, they will come across a monk organization with more than suspicious methods and they'll soon be at war.
description.ja: 時は永禄、戦国時代…。妖狐･たまと仙道･迅火の"義姉弟"が、乱世にはびこる巨悪を討つ！！気鋭･水上悟志が挑む戦国冒険ファンタジー、遂に登場！！！

description.en:
There is a dream worth putting two lives on the line for.  
  
Tsukasa, a young man with shattered dreams, and Inori, a girl no one believed in. However, in the face of adversity, those two possessed a tenacity towards the rink greater than anyone had ever known. Together, they meet on the ice, and aim for the world with their figure skating!

---

**Links:**  
- [Series' Twitter](https://twitter.com/medalist_AFT)
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA (U.S. Only)](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10231/episode/318207), [Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/medalist/)
description.es:
Tsukasa es un patinador que, tras haber dejado atrás su sueño de convertirse en un atleta de élite por problemas económicos, trabaja realizando espectáculos de patinaje sobre hielo.

Pero todo cambia cuando conoce a Inori, una niña que acude a una pista de hielo a escondidas de su madre, aunque esta esté totalmente en contra de ello y todo el mundo piense que es tarde para ella, y que es demasiado inútil.

Así, gracias a la tenacidad que muestra Inori, Tsukasa decide convertirse en su entrenador y buscará ayudarla en el difícil mundo del patinaje artístico, prometiéndose que la llevará a la cima.
description.zh: 用利刃融化坚冰、开拓人生——！

A story about being followed around by a girl who appears to be just a hallucination.

---

description.en:
The leaves of the chess game beside Lanke, and the chess game between the old trees is uninteresting, causing Tian Yuan's son, and then looking back at the vast mountains and seas... When he wakes up, Ji Yuan has become a half-blind beggar in a dilapidated mountain temple. A real person has a sword and a magic stick has a mouth, which is the foundation of Jiyuan's foothold in this terrible world.

---

Wilted leaves beside the board, empty seats between the towering trees, a passerby who chose to put down a stone in the middle of the board, unbeknownst to him eons have passed… Waking up from his slumber, Ji Yuan found himself as a half-blind beggar. Armed with only a sword and his wits, he will venture forth into this danger-filled world.
description.id: “Daun jatuh di permainan catur di sisi Rotten Ke, dan pohon-pohon tua bermain melawan satu sama lain karena putra Tian Yuan yang tidak menarik, dan kemudian melihat kembali ke pegunungan dan lautan yang luas … Ketika dia bangun, Ji Yuan menjadi  seorang pengemis setengah buta di kuil gunung yang bobrok.  Pedang, tongkat suci, dan satu mulut adalah dasar bagi Ji Yuan untuk menetap di dunia yang mengerikan ini.”

altTitles.en: The Role of the Femme Fatale

description.en: Kairan Girls' Academy. A boarding school rich with history and tradition, attended only by orphans. It has a special system in which students are given "roles" that align with their individual goals. Hanako Shimura, a kind-hearted girl filled with dreams and expectations, enrolls into the academy hoping to make friends with everyone at school. But will she be able to?
description.ja: 私立廻蘭女学院中学。そこは孤児院出身の子どもたちのみが通う、歴史と伝統ある寄宿学校。この学校には古くから、生徒たちへ個々の目標に沿った【役柄】を与えるという特殊な制度があった。心優しい少女・志村花子は「学校中のみんなと友達になる」ことを目標に入学すると、いきなりとんでもない課題を与えられてしまい――！？クセ強めなクラスメイトたちに囲まれて「愛人作り」はできるのか！？

description.en:
Kang Jihyoung,wanted to become a hunter for his mother.

However, his bullies put his mother into a vegetative state. He tried to take revenge but was thoroughly crushed and trapped...

The boy who lost everything became a beast and began his hunt.
description.ko: 엄마를 위해 헌터가 되려 했던 주인공 지형. 그러나 일진들이 엄마를 식물인간으로 만든다. 복수하려 했지만, 철저히 부서지고 갇히는데… 모든 걸 잃은 소년은 마수가 되어 사냥을 시작한다.

description.en:
Continuation of the manga "Jesus". The legendary killer, hiding under the guise of school teacher Fujisawa Shingo, returns to Japan after more than ten years! What made him come back? What has he been doing for these ten years? Is one of his new students connected to 24?
Read on and find out in JESUS: Path of the Sandstorm!

altTitles.vi: Đảo Hải Tặc
Vua Hải Tặc

description.en:
Gol D. Roger, a man referred to as the "Pirate King," is set to be executed by the World Government. But just before his demise, he confirms the existence of a great treasure, One Piece, located somewhere within the vast ocean known as the Grand Line. Announcing that One Piece can be claimed by anyone worthy enough to reach it, the Pirate King is executed and the Great Age of Pirates begins.  
  
Twenty-two years later, a young man by the name of Monkey D. Luffy is ready to embark on his own adventure, searching for One Piece and striving to become the new Pirate King. Armed with just a straw hat, a small boat, and an elastic body, he sets out on a fantastic journey to gather his own crew and a worthy ship that will take them across the Grand Line to claim the greatest status on the high seas.

---

**Note:**  
**Because a takedown notice was sent to MangaDex from the owners of this series, English fan translations of One Piece are unable to be posted at this time. The series can be read in its entirety at [the official Shonen Jump website,](https://www.viz.com/shonenjump/chapters/one-piece) with the first and latest three chapters available at any time and the rest accessible with a Shonen Jump membership (which costs about $2 a month and can be accessed via a VPN if you are outside the US). The three most recent chapters can also be read on MangaPlus for free by clicking the chapter links below.**

---
- **The Best-Selling Manga in History**
- **Won the 41st Japan Cartoonists Association Award Grand Prize alongside Neko Darake in 2012** 
- **Received the Kumamoto Prefecture Honorary Prize in 2018**
description.es: Hace veintidós años, el legendario pirata, Gold D. Roger fue ejecutado. Sus últimas palabras fueron que su tesoro conocido como "One Piece" estaba escondido en algún lugar dentro del vasto océano conocido como Grand Line. Esto dio inicio a la Era de los Piratas. Ahora, Monkey D. Luffy, un joven que, inspirado por su ídolo de la infancia emprende su viaje buscando el One Piece y convertirse en el Rey de los Piratas.
description.ru: Последние слова, произнесённые Королем Пиратов Гол Д. Роджером перед казнью, вдохновили многих выйти в море: «Мои сокровища? Я завещаю их тому, кто сможет их найти. Ищите! Я все оставил в одном месте!». Лишённые сна и покоя люди ринулись на Гранд Лайн, самое опасное место в мире. Так началась великая эра пиратов… Но с каждым годом романтиков становилось все меньше, их постепенно вытесняли прагматичные пираты-разбойники, которым награбленное добро было куда ближе, чем какие-то «никчёмные мечты». Но вот, одним прекрасным днем, семнадцатилетний Монки Д. Луффи исполнил заветную мечту детства - отправился в море. Его цель — ни много, ни мало стать новым Королём Пиратов. За достаточно короткий срок юному капитану удаётся собрать команду, состоящую из не менее амбициозных искателей приключений. И пусть ими движут совершенно разные устремления, главное, этим ребятам важны не столько деньги и слава, сколько куда более ценное – принципы и верность друзьям. И ещё – служение Мечте. Что же, пока по Гранд Лайн плавают такие люди, Великая Эра Пиратов всегда будет с нами!
description.uk:
Король піратів Ґолд Роджер буде страчений Світовим урядом. Прямо перед смертю він підтвердив існування великого скарбу «Ван Піс», який знаходиться десь на величезному морі Ґранд Лайн. Як тільки Роджер сказав, що будь-хто гідний досягти Ван Пісу може забрати його собі, його стратили, і почалася Велика ера піратів.

Двадцять два роки потому, молодий хлопець на ім’я Монкі Д. Луффі готовий почати свою пригоду по пошуку Ван Пісу та здобуванню титулу Короля піратів. Маючи при собі солом’яну шапку, невеличкий човен та еластичне тіло, він вирушає у неймовірну подорож, щоб зібрати собі команду та хороший корабель, який зможе пронести їх через весь Ґранд Лайн, щоб стати найвеличнішими в усіх морях.
description.es-la: Hace veintidós años, el legendario pirata, Gold D. Roger fue ejecutado. Sus últimas palabras fueron que su tesoro conocido como "One Piece" estaba escondido en algún lugar dentro del vasto océano conocido como Grand Line. Esto dio inicio a la Era de los Piratas. Ahora, Monkey D. Luffy, un joven que, inspirado por su ídolo de la infancia emprende su viaje buscando el One Piece y convertirse en el Rey de los Piratas.
description.pt-br: One Piece começa quando Gol D. Roger, o Rei Dos Piratas que possuiu tudo nesse mundo, antes de ser executado, diz que escondeu o seu tesouro em algum lugar da Grand Line, um oceano extremamente perigoso. Desde então muitos piratas se aventuram pela Grand Line para tentar encontrar o tesouro chamado One Piece. Um deles é Monkey D. Luffy, o garoto que, acidentalmente, comeu uma das Akuma No Mi, a Gomu Gomu No Mi (Fruta da Borracha), e agora ele pode esticar seu corpo como se fosse uma borracha. A jornada dele começa atrás de companheiros e um barco, que ele vai conseguindo pouco a pouco, pois tem um objetivo: Ser o Rei Dos Piratas!!
